abstract: Federal prosecutors filed court papers Thursday indicating a former Intel executive charged in a massive insider trading case has agreed to waive indictment, a necessary step before a guilty plea can be entered.
snippet: Federal prosecutors filed court papers Thursday indicating a former Intel executive charged in a massive insider trading case has agreed to waive indictment, a necessary step before a guilty plea can be entered.
lead_paragraph: Federal prosecutors filed court papers Thursday indicating a former Intel executive charged in a huge insider trading case has agreed to waive indictment, a necessary step before a guilty plea can be entered.

headline.main: Path Cleared for Plea by Former Intel Executive
